meanings.sent1: The photographer used photoflashes to capture the perfect shot.
meanings.sent2: I always carry extra photoflashes in my camera bag.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel stole the photoflashes and started a disco party in the forest.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a thousand photoflashes, lighting up the room.
meanings.sent5: The photoflashes illuminated the dark alley, revealing hidden secrets.
